message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this unique product with you. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm looking for a serious buyer. I'm willing to start the conversation with an offer of $900000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and my budget.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking of a price of $875000. This is my final offer for now.

I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $860000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial price.
